sub_title: Director Global System Integration & Verification at Philips MR R&D
summary: I am a people and results oriented manager with broad experience in integration and verification of complex/high-tech systems and in managing technical professionals. My management style can be characterized as finding the right balance between objectives for the longer term and a pragmatic approach with quick wins for the short term. I have an eye for quality, good communication skills and I am able to create calmness in hectic environments.

profile_positions.description:
Leading the global System Integration & Verification department (60+ employees) of the Philips MR R&D organization with teams in Best (NLD), Suzhou (CHN), Bangalore and Pune (IND). 
Main responsibilities are:
- ensuring tight alignment of and delivering on the integration and verification activities across the program portfolio
- grow and develop the integration and verification competencies within the teams across sites
- manage and optimize the global test system footprint
- continuous improvement activities to drive test coverage and efficiency improvements across the global MR R&D organization
profile_positions.title: Director MR R&D Global System Integration & Verification

profile_positions.description:

- ensuring tight alignment of verification activities across programs
- further grow and develop the verification competency across sites

Additionally leading the Center of Excellence for Software Development and Reliability for the Diagnostic Imaging I2M organization. Responsible for improving software reliability of Diagnostic Imaging products and services, as well as driving harmonization on related tools, processes, and methodologies across Diagnostic Imaging businesses.
profile_positions.title: Director MR System Verification

profile_positions.description:
Leading a team of 15 technical professionals (bachelor/university level) and responsible for the (sub) system verification of the premium MR systems. This responsibility includes managing verification teams on different MR sites involved in performing the verification activities on content.

Main tasks:
• Definition and rollout of the global verification strategy and the allocation of responsibilities across the different MR R&D sites
• Owner of the Design Verification and Defect Management processes of the MR Quality Management System
• As member of the MR R&D staff share the responsibility for the definition and implementation of the vision and strategy of the R&D department
• Chairman of the Requirements Management and Test Process Group for Philips Healthcare site Best
profile_positions.title: Group Leader Integration & Verification

profile_positions.description:
Technically coordinating the system verification activities within the multisite MR development organization and responsible for the strategic choices made with regard to the system verification. As a member of the staff of the System Integration & Verification department reporting directly to the department manager.

Main tasks:
• Managing the Test Architecture Team (8 professionals on bachelor/university level) and responsible for defining the overall test architecture, test processes and roadmap
• Define and implement the system test strategy
• Evaluate the test process and initiating, implementing and managing R&D wide test process improvement projects
• Shared responsibility for the policy and competency development within the System Integration & Verification department
• Improve efficiency and predictability of the system verification process with respect to test coverage, results, planning and required effort
profile_positions.title: System Test Architect

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for system integration and system verification activities in development programs. Initiated and implemented test process improvements which led to a new development and test approach for multi-site development.

Main tasks:
• Defining the test strategy and test approach for development programs
• Planning and coordination of system integration and system verification activities
• Chairman of the Development Integration/Verification Team (multidisciplinary team coordinating the system integration and verification activities)
• Reporting on status and progress of the system integration and system verification activities
• Initiate and implement test process improvements within programs
